long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Demo application, it incorporates Vaadin application and serial port access through Chrome Platform API.

To run the application you need Nucleo-L053 MCU demo board and X-NUCLEO-IKS01A1 sensor shield board. DataLog firmware should be flashed there.
